Average negative shocks to annual TFP growth rate were 0.012 degrees C/year * 1.523 (Table 2, Column (2)) /equal 0.018% (SE /equal 0.005%) per year larger than positive shocks, related to a 0.6°C increase in temperature over the sample period. The study period ends in 2006, so this is the year that the average temperature is calculated over.
